title: Is We Dumb? | Groundhog. Slip N' Slide. Homicide. Haircut.
description:
Wait... a college professor got fired for saying a word in a completely different language, that kinda sounded like a racial slur in another completely different language?! Let's talk about that, having a pet groundhog that lives under your porch, getting matching haircuts with your son, calling out people who don't put their shopping carts back, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!


The number one thing you can do to help us out the gate is to rate, review, and subscribe to Is We Dumb? wherever you listen to podcasts! We truly appreciate your support.


New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST


Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/PzKu2sll1io


Show Links:

Cart Narcs | https://bit.ly/328SLwx

Groundhog Pet | https://bit.ly/387b6Oy


Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

IG: https://instagram.com/iswedumb

FB: https://facebook.com/iswedumb

BadMagic YouTube: http://youtube.com/badmagicproductions


Official Website: http://iswedumb.com

Threads: http://badmagicmerch.com


Custom Music Beds by Zach Cohen

Coeur d'Alene, ID 83816
